tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Due to doctor's busy schedule the appointment fixed at 11.30 could materialized at 12.30. However the doctor was very polite n e planned in detail the need for applying knee brace as also physical exercises for better progress in recovery.

tags: None
review:
I know Dr Bhagrawa for last  15 year, he is a great person and great doctor. Patients with professional attitude and a personal touch.
I referred all my friends n relative s, to him, who so ever needed .

tags: None
review: He was not so interested to give answers of our queries. we also not satisfied by his answer. he sent to another doctor and told another doctor is specialist of this problem while another doctor denied, very weird. I can't trust him now. how a doctor can't satisfy the patient after all the test done the doctor prescribed. The test and consultation was ₹ 28k + 3900.

tags: None
review:
Treatment taken for decompression problem but still no improvement & mother still even after 1 month she is not able to walk & still we are very disturbed mentally & she is having severe pain in back due to which not able to sit & stand.W e
Pray that everything will be all right in future months
